abstract: Two days after Citigroup moved to untangle itself from Washington, the Treasury backed away from plans to immediately sell a portion of its stake in the bank, according to a person briefed on the situation.
snippet: Two days after Citigroup moved to untangle itself from Washington, the Treasury backed away from plans to immediately sell a portion of its stake in the bank, according to a person briefed on the situation.
lead_paragraph: Just when Vikram S. Pandit thought he was out, Washington is pulling him back in.

headline.main: Government Reconsiders Quick Sale of Citigroup Stake
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Said To Rethink Quick Sale Of Citi Stake
